alert.note: Alert for Clinch; Southern Ware (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 01 at 5:34PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Columbia, southeastern Echols, south central Ware and southeastern Clinch Counties through 630 PM EDT... At 534 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles north of Needmore, or 12 miles northwest of Fargo, moving south at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph, penny size hail, and excessive cloud-to-ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Excessive cloud-to-ground lightning is occurring. Locations impacted include... Fargo and Needmore. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
